pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Contribute/Bugsquad/Guide To BugTriaging" - KDE TechBase
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7718=Initial version by Dario Andres (2010-03). Corrections by Lydia Pintscher}
textBeforeTable: For every KDE application it is recommended to install the debug information for "kdelibs" and "qt4" Debug package names for several distributions Basic guide about crash reports How to create useful crash reports Preparing a testing environment A Bug's Life Cycle Dario_Andres blog about bug triaging Quick introduction to Bugzilla BugSquad page on Techbase Useful Links Power Management functions use PowerDevil [Bugzilla product: "solid", component: "powerdevil-daemon"] Hardware related functions use Solid classes [Bugzilla product: "solid"] Multimedia applications reading audio tags use taglib [Bugzilla product: "taglib"] Scanning related applications probably use the KSane lib [Bugzilla product: "libksane"] Games use libkdegames [Bugzilla product: "libkdegames"] Screen management related operations use the Kephal subsystem [Bugzilla product: "kephal"] Applications using OpenDesktop services uses Attica [Bugzilla product: "attica"] Applications using KHTML [Bugzilla product: konqueror"] PIM related applications use kdepimlibs, Akonadi and kresources technologies [Bugzilla products: "kdepim", "kdepimlibs", "Akonadi", "kresources"] Multimedia usage: Phonon library [Bugzilla product: "Phonon"] Oxygen widget style (default) [Bugzilla product: "oxygen" component "style"] (I'm adding the component because "Oxygen" also refers to a Plasma and icon themes) Applications using
textAfterTable: For a detailed list of distributions naming scheme examples you can look at How to obtain debug packages for every distribution. Glossary Testcase: custom file that triggers a bug in the application. A testcase can also be a custom code snippet, or to a set of steps.
